name: Antibiotic stewardship: long term antibiotics for UTIs compared with methenamine
title: Antibiotic stewardship: long term antibiotics for UTIs compared with methenamine
description: Proportion of prescriptions for long term prophylaxis (28 days or more) of urinary-tract infections per 1000 patients compared with methenamine
numerator_short: Items with quantity of 28 days or more
denominator_short: Items with quantity of 28 days or more and all methenamine
y_label: Proportion of antibiotics commonly used for UTI prophylaxis prescribed as 28 days or more compared with methenamine
numerator_where:
(bnf_code LIKE '0501080W0%AD' AND quantity_per_item >=28) OR --Trimethoprim 100mg tablets (brands and generic)
(bnf_code LIKE '0501130R0%AA' AND quantity_per_item >=28) OR --Nitrofurantoin 50mg capsules (brands and generic)
(bnf_code LIKE '0501130R0%AD' AND quantity_per_item >=28) --Nitrofurantoin 50mg tablets (brands and generic)
denominator_where:
(bnf_code LIKE '0501080W0%AD' AND quantity_per_item >=28) OR --Trimethoprim 100mg tablets (brands and generic)
(bnf_code LIKE '0501130R0%AA' AND quantity_per_item >=28) OR --Nitrofurantoin 50mg capsules (brands and generic)
(bnf_code LIKE '0501130R0%AD' AND quantity_per_item >=28) OR --Nitrofurantoin 50mg tablets (brands and generic)
(bnf_code LIKE '0501130H0%AA')  --Methenamine hippurate 1g tablets (brands and generic)
